messages.message:
<!here>
Following up on the latest update (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1743707188277649?thread_ts=1743527884.923439&cid=C06FA6A23), there are a couple of small changes to the plan! :slightly_smiling_face:

1. We will *not* be changing the URL for PreProd Jenkins as part of this migration, but instead will plan that for a later date. This was just an unneeded variable, and it'd behoove all of us to reduce those!
    a. Since the URL won't be changing, I won't need to redeploy Sandbox ICC either. :+1:
2. To clarify on the 'rollback' plan and its viability.  The procedure is grouped into pre- and post-DNS cutover phases, and as such:
    a. If there is a blocking validation failure, we'll simply not cutover DNS, address the blockers and try again next week.
    b. If the validation steps pass and there are *post-DNS cutover* issues that come up, rolling back to GCP is not advised and we'll only do so if there's no other path to resolution.
CC: <!subteam^S08AA13VAFQ> @sudeep @jayapandian.ponraj @Rahul et. al. :slightly_smiling_face:
CC: @Arek since I can't tag you in an edit of the original message. lol (regarding the "not deploying ICC this weekend after all" bit)
